title: Hi. I ordered Google Pixel 3 phone from Kogan.com . Wanted Google pixel 3 XL . But in hurry ordered pixel 3 . Its still sealed in the box. And kogan people say i cant return it they are frauds. Its against the law. They have no contact number as well..what do i do ? Please help me
content: I ordered Google Pixel 3 instead of Google pixel 3 XL in hurry . Bought it online from a site called kogan.com  ..when it came and I realised I made an incorrect purchase.  They said no for a return.  Its sealed in the box. This is against the Australian law. They are frauds..they dont even have a contact number to talk to. Just an email.what do I do now ? Please help me
